description.value:
[Addictive] +3 Degrees of Succes to passed Agility and Perception checks for 2d10 Minutes. Afterwards -20 to Agility and Perception for 1d5 hours.

Requirements

Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -20 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: 75 T
